title: Rive Interactive Toggle Switch
description: Create an animated toggle switch using Rive state machines.
instructions: Build a RiveToggle widget that uses a Rive animation with a state machine. The toggle should have an 'isOn' boolean input in its state machine. When tapped, toggle the state and update the Rive input. The widget should accept an initial value and notify parent of changes via callback. Handle the onInit to find and store the SMIBool input reference.

hints.text: Use StateMachineController.fromArtboard() to get the controller
Cast the result of findInput<bool>() to SMIBool

commonMistakes.mistake: Forgetting to add controller to artboard
commonMistakes.consequence: State machine doesn't run and animation doesn't respond
commonMistakes.correction: Call artboard.addController(controller) after creating the StateMachineController

commonMistakes.consequence: App crashes if state machine name doesn't match
commonMistakes.correction: Check if controller is not null before using it
